name: openvpn-monitor
description: To show connected vpn clients in a small webpage dynamicly.
author: Netsky, neptuntriton

scripts.build-docker-amd64: yarn build && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 BUILDKIT_PROGRESS=plain docker build --no-cache -t n0vum/openvpn-monitor:v1.0.1-amd64 --build-arg ARCH=amd64 .
scripts.build-docker-arm64: yarn build && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 BUILDKIT_PROGRESS=plain docker build --no-cache -t n0vum/openvpn-monitor:v1.0.1-arm64 --build-arg ARCH=arm64 .
scripts.create-docker-manifest: docker manifest create n0vum/openvpn-monitor:v1.0.1 --amend n0vum/openvpn-monitor:v1.0.1-amd64 --amend n0vum/openvpn-monitor:v1.0.1-arm64
